module.name: requirement_identification_and_version
module.purpose:
This part of ISO 10303 specifies and application module for the representation of the data that identify a requirement and versions of requirements.
This module has been developed by the AP233 development team

inscope.li: representation of the data that identify a requirement and its versions

outscope.li: characterization of a requirement in a particular domain;
representation of any use of a requirement.

uof.name: Requirement
uof.description: The Requirement UoF specifies the data type needed to represent the data that identify a requirement.

uof.name: Requirement_Version
uof.description: The Requirement_Version specifies the data type needed to represent the data that identify a version of requirement.

uof.name: Requirement_Version_Relationship
uof.description: The Requirement_Version_Relationship UoF specifies the data type needed to represent a sequential relationship between two versions of a relationship.
